docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Scale, Spread and Embed FFT Programme: driving responsive and timely improvements in patient experience using natural language processing

For full documentation visit the Future Collaboration website.

docs.title: What need is this programme addressing?
docs.text: Across the NHS valuablefree-text patient feedback is collected from the Friends and Family Test (FFT), butisunder-utilised due to a lack of human resource and no systematic way of extracting useful insights to drive quality improvement(QI).
